NanoObjectDetection.Simulation module¶

Created on Mon Mar 4 15:17:36 2019

@author: Ronny Förster und Stefan Weidlich

GenerateRandomWalk(diameter, num_particles, frames, frames_per_second, ep=0, mass=1, microns_per_pixel=0.477, temp_water=295, visc_water=9.5e-16)[source]¶

Simulate a random walk of brownian diffusion and return it in a panda like it came from real data

diameter num_particles: number of particles to simular frames: frames simulated frames_per_second ep = 0 :estimation precision mass = 1: mass of the particle microns_per_pixel = 0.477 temp_water = 295 visc_water = 9.5e-16:

PrepareRandomWalk(ParameterJsonFile)[source]¶

Configure the parameters for a randowm walk out of a JSON file
